channel.title: I need help how do i turn off scanning rar files so i can open it from email
channel.description: it keeps saying the file crazyman1167.rar cant be scanned for virus because there are to mnay individual files pleas i need help i know how to run server but i tried to transfer files over to other comp put i cant open the rar file without it saying that so i cant even download it onto my comp because of the tomuch fucking secruity on it please tell how 9i can turn it off or another way of getting past secruity

item.title: I need help how do i turn off scanning rar files so i can open it from email
item.dc:creator: @crazyman1167 crazyman1167
item.description:
@crazyman1167 wrote:

i ziped file of my server all into one rar file so i could attach it to an email on my hotmail now i want to start it up again but when i clicked on my email to dowload it it says that so i need to know how i can disable it so it wont scan i dont know if its norton scanning it or if its the internet thats scanning it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2008, 08:21:40 AM[/size][hr]any computer geniusâ€™s [br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2008, 08:26:38 AM[/size][hr]help
